Texts.Eng: Talk to ^orange;Rokhan^reset; to warp down to the ^orange;planet below^reset;

The Vanguard is having issues with violated Drahl units on Kharmani. I need you to warp down to the planet's surface and ^green;put an end to the ^orange;Violated Elite Drahl ^green;roaming the grounds^white;. In return, ^green;you will earn yourself access to the Vanguard's shooting range ^white;here in the Starfarer's Refuge.
Well done, I hear that the violated Elite Drahl has been eliminated. Please, take this security card; it will allow you to open the door to the shooting range.
